@spinny_spinny_yo_xo  download speed depends on internet connection and ratio of seeders to leechers, simply put lots of seeds and few leechers is good for downloading quickly, as for downloading it you need a bit torrent client like vuze or Utorrent, (free to download), then simply click download torrent, you should get a download appear in the bottom left of your browser window, click on it when your torrent client is open and it will start the download, hope this helps.
